8.1.hd_quote: The awareness that the whole is always greater than the sum of its parts.
8.1.behavioral_axis: Accepts limitations as individual, shares unique knowing to guide collective while maintaining distinct identity and protecting against conformity.
8.1.shadow_axis: Withdraws from sharing creative direction, fears losing individuality in group environment and becoming absorbed into collective sameness.
8.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

8.2.hd_quote: The highest good, to serve selflessly.
8.2.behavioral_axis: Naturally projects capacity to guide and make contributions, called out by others to offer direction without deep recognition of what's actually being contributed.
8.2.shadow_axis: Projects signal of contribution like paper tiger, cannot fulfill when called upon to deliver, faces crisis when collective withdraws attention.
8.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

8.3.hd_quote: The acceptance of the style and not the substance of communal actions.
8.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments with styles and masks through trial-and-error to connect with collective, learns what roles work for expressing individual contribution.
8.3.shadow_axis: Over-relies on style without substance, underestimates others' ability to detect superficiality and becomes confused when mask fails to work.
8.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

8.4.hd_quote: The gift of naturally recognizing the contributions of others and particularly, the acknowledgement of those who lead by example.
8.4.behavioral_axis: Externalizes through fixed communication, recognizes creative potential in others and connects that potential to collective through selfless contribution and example.
8.4.shadow_axis: Makes contributions without feeling recognized, becomes fixed on needing acknowledgment for their example despite being themselves rather than best.
8.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

8.5.hd_quote: The ultimate goal of the individual teacher is to have students that not only transcend them but leave them.
8.5.behavioral_axis: Holds projection field as teacher/guide who contributes direction then releases others to their path, accepts that successful guidance means eventual separation.
8.5.shadow_axis: Cannot let go after making contribution, holds on to those who receive guidance and feels loss when they leave despite recognizing limitation.
8.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

8.6.hd_quote: The success of individual contribution is determined by timing.
8.6.behavioral_axis: Recognizes patterns to contribute at correct timing, waits for cosmic moment when contribution can unleash mutation rather than mundane guidance.
8.6.shadow_axis: Doubts timing even in ideal circumstances, becomes paralyzed seeking perfect mutative moment and questions whether contribution has real value for change.
8.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
